name: Léidiàn Huáng: Pikachu Chuánshuō
summary: Léidiàn Huáng: Bíkǎqiū Chuánshuō (also known as Pokémon Yellow) is a pirated game for the NES made by Shenzhen Nanjing. It's generally regarded as being of higher quality compared to Shenzhen Nanjing's other games. This game is basically a port of Pokémon FireRed / Pokémon LeafGreen Version and Pokémon Yellow Version mixed together with some changes to it.

name: Léto s Oskarem
summary: Léto s Oskarem is a 1998 Czech adventure game authored by Pavel Širůček and distributed by Vochozka Trading.

name: Léo e Maya
summary:
Leo e Maya is an educational game made for kids around 7 to 12 years of age, aiming to teach computational thinking. It was developed by college students as a Final Graduation Project.
Save the wildlife and fulfill the missions by writing instructions to the best rescue team there is!
